title: People Over Profits
description: We exist purely for the benefit of Merced’s community and environment, so we are a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization.

title: Community-Driven Mission
description: Our garden grows with the input of Merced residents—join us in shaping a space for all.

title: Accountability and Transparency
description: We are committed to open books and responsible leadership, keeping our supporters informed every step of the way.
